original_title: Do Digital Curanderas Use Eggs in Their Limpias?
overview: A California barrio is on the brink of eradication after most of the community leaves behind their bodies and the pain of carbon-based life by uploading their consciousness to the Internet. Now, one of the few remaining residents, a lonely queer, gender fluid, Indigenous curandera/healer who has lost their magic, must convince their last living friend, an anti-uploading activist, to support their decision to upload their consciousness  and leave their body behind.
title: Do Digital Curanderas Use Eggs in Their Limpias?
